title: [Royal Court, Burzost Square NW]
description: A faint smell of wood smoke drifts from boarded up openings of an abandoned tavern.  Pride of ownerships shows in few local shanties, slightly increasing the quality of life in this area.  Time spent removing the boardwalk and surrounding buildings has resulted in expansive green space and wildflowers.

Faint streaks of light pierce the gaps in the boarded up openings and single window of an abandoned tavern.  Pride of ownership shows in the few local shanties, slightly increasing the quality of life in this area.  Time spent removing the boardwalk and surrounding buildings has resulted in expansive green space and wildflowers.
